Class Applicant

  • java.lang.Object
    • Applicant
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Applicant
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    The Applicant class is meant to model an applicant that will be applying to a company. It will contain applicant's name, GPA, college, skills that he/she have and the companies that he/she is applying to.

    It implements Cloneable interface in order to create a clone of itself

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Applicant()
      The default constructor of Applicant class it is just used to constructor a John Doe Applicant if no information is given, later on you can use mutator methods to change a default Applicant's information

      The parameterized constructor for a Applicant when given specific information

    • Constructor Detail

      • Applicant

        public Applicant()
        The default constructor of Applicant class it is just used to constructor a John Doe Applicant if no information is given, later on you can use mutator methods to change a default Applicant's information

      • Applicant

        public Applicant(java.lang.String[] givenCompany,
                 java.lang.String givenName,
                 double givenGPA,
                 java.lang.String givenCollege,
                 java.lang.String[] givenSkills)
          throws NegativeException
        The parameterized constructor for a Applicant when given specific information
        Parameters:
        givenCompany - The array of company that the Applicant have worked for
        givenName - The name of the Applicant
        givenGPA - Applicant's GPA
        givenCollege - The name of the college that Applicant went to
        givenSkills - The array of skills that the Applicant have
        Throws:
        NegativeException - If the given GPA is less than zero

      • setCompanyName

        public void setCompanyName(java.lang.String[] givenCompany)
        The mutator method for the Applicant's company array.

        Precondition: The Applicant's array of companies must be instantiated

        Postcondition: The Applicant's array of companies is set to givenCompany

        Parameters:
        givenCompany - The given array of company that you want to give to the Applicant

      • setApplicantGPA

        public void setApplicantGPA(double givenGPA)
                     throws NegativeException
        The mutator method for the Applicant's GPA. It will throw NegativeException if the givenGPA is less than 0

        Postcondition: The Applicant's GPA is set to givenGPA if it is not a negative number

        Parameters:
        givenGPA - The given GPA that you want to set the Applicant's GPA to
        Throws:
        NegativeException - Indicate that the user have inputted a negative GPA for the Applicant
